‘ggrepel’ is great, and indispensable when making exploratory (or publication-ready) maps in #rstats pic.twitter.com/3ivyOXtDGz

— Michael Dorman (@MichaelDorman84) November 11, 2019

ggrepel: simply repulsive text labels for garrulous ggplot graphs 😍. 🙌 Thank you to @slowkow & all other contributors! 📉👾🧶 pic.twitter.com/6d2P0c8iwU

— Allison Horst (@allison_horst) April 7, 2019

Today, I'm thankful for the directlabels and @slowkow's ggrepel #Rstats packages:https://t.co/ZO0PyqFxaHhttps://t.co/OrOJ1L55H7

These packages make it easier to add labels to plots

Everyone using #ggplot for #dataviz should consider working them into their plots
